page.title: 08HORTICULTURE AT LUSHCOTT
page.content: I am a self-employed nurseryman specialising in bedding and pot plants.The business has been developed over the last 12 years,I am the only full-time worker but employ casual labour in the Spring for pricking out and potting on.The work is seasonal, starting in February with Primroses & Polyanthus, sowing seeds, filling trays and pots, then pricking out of seedlings, along with general care. The majority of plants are sold wholesale to garden centres,local shops and Birmingham Wholesale Market.Retail sales are also increasing annually.The job is labour intensive with few mechanical aids - watering is done by hand as it is far more accurate than by an irrigation line.Heating used is bottled Propane Gas and Premium Paraffin.
